OpenStack Summit Presentations – VOTE NOW!

Feb 21, 2014 • colinmcnamara

It’s time to vote for presentations for OpenStack Summit in Atlanta. I’ve submitted a few presentations, as well am co-submitting some presentations with people I really respect in the community. I’ve stack ranked what I feel are the priorities to discuss in each, as well as bolded the critical presentations in each area. If you find these valuable, please let your voice be heard and vote.

Now, a great presentation may not be listed in here. I’m under a bit of a time crunch right now, and took the short list of presentations I’ve discussed with people. As I got through and do my own voting I’ll add in others that are of value and merit to the community.

Critical Presentations to discuss at the Summit

CI Pipeline Bootcamp submitted by Sean Roberts ( Speakers: Colin McNamara, Sean Roberts, Tom Fifield, Monty Taylor )https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/ci-pipeline-bootcamp

OpenStack University Courses submitted by Sean Roberts ( Speakers: Tristan Goode, Colin McNamara, Sean Roberts, Loic Dachary, Matjaž Pančur ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/openstack-university-courses

Contributing back as an Operator ( Speaker: Colin McNamara ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/contributing-back-as-and-operator

OpenStack Training – Community Created and Delivered Training for OpenStack ( Speakers: Colin McNamara, Sean Roberts )https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/openstack-training-community-created-and-delivered-training-for-openstack

Community Presentations

OpenStack Participation submitted by Sean Roberts ( Speakers: Colin McNamara, Sean Roberts, Stefano Maffulli, Heidi Bretz ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/openstack-participation

Trainer Rating System submitted by Sean Roberts ( Speakers: Colin McNamara, Sean Roberts, Mark Collier, Pranav Salunke ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/trainer-rating-system

Hackathon Syllabus submitted by Sean Roberts ( Speakers: Kyle Mestery, Colin McNamara, Sean Roberts, Shannon McFarland ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/hackathon-syllabus

Presentations Directly Submitted by me

Multi-Node DevStack w/ Puppet ( Speaker: Colin McNamara ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/multi-node-devstack-w-puppet

How we failed transitioning our Engineers to Developers, and how that turned into an EPIC Win ( Speaker: Colin McNamara ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/how-we-failed-transitioning-our-engineers-to-developers-and-how-that-turned-into-an-epic-win

Value Stream Mapping – Figuring out what should I move to OpenStack ( Speaker: Colin McNamara ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/value-stream-mapping-figuring-out-what-should-i-move-to-openstack

Agile SDN Development (TDD for SDN) using OpenDaylight, OpenStack, Open vSwitch and Mininet ( Speaker: Colin McNamara ) https://www.openstack.org/vote-atlanta/Presentation/agile-sdn-development-tdd-for-sdn-using-opendaylight-openstack-open-vswitch-and-mininet
